_description: Allocation percentages by methodology. Source: Phase 2 Master Refunds (4,156 claims). Variable cases use historical averages as defaults.

User location.description: Based on T-Mobile employee locations outside WA
User location.notes: Historical avg from 802 claims (range: 12.7%-100%). Varies by product/period.

Headcount.description: Based on T-Mobile headcount ratio (non-WA / total)
Headcount.notes: Historical avg from 103 claims (range: 20%-94.9%). Headcount ratio updated periodically.

Equipment Location.description: Based on equipment deployed outside WA
Equipment Location.notes: Historical avg from 165 claims (range: 10.5%-100%). Per-vendor equipment inventory varies.

Call center.description: Based on call center locations outside WA
Call center.notes: Historical avg from 260 claims (range: 94.9%-100%). Very consistent allocation.

Call center Retail.description: Call center allocation for retail operations
Call center Retail.notes: Historical avg from 260 claims. Subset of call center methodology.

Retail stores.description: Based on retail store locations outside WA
Retail stores.notes: Historical avg from 75 claims (range: 75.9%-100%). Store count ratio.

Engineering.description: Based on engineering staff locations outside WA
Engineering.notes: Historical avg from 24 claims. Engineering headcount subset.

RF Engineering.description: Based on RF engineering resource locations
RF Engineering.notes: Similar to Engineering allocation. Small sample size.

Subscribers.description: Based on subscriber count outside WA
Subscribers.notes: Estimated from small sample. Subscriber ratio data improves accuracy.

Non-taxable.description: 100% refund for non-taxable items (e.g., professional services)

Wrong rate.description: Refund equals difference between charged and correct rate
Wrong rate.notes: Rate-dependent â€” calculated from actual vs expected rate variance

Resale.description: 100% refund for resale items with valid resale certificate
Resale.notes: Must have resale certificate on file

MPU.notes: Uses same calculation as User location. Historical avg from 284 claims.

Fraud team.notes: Small sample, variable. Falls back to LLM estimate.

Project location.notes: Project-specific, variable. Falls back to LLM estimate.

Call center + Marketing.notes: Similar to Call center allocation. Historical avg from 26 claims.
